### Template 1: â„ï¸ Winter Logo - Close-up Face (Standard)

```
TAPI, an anime girl with long flowing blonde hair, bright blue eyes, large red over-ear headphones. She has a gentle smile and slight blush with clean skin. Extreme close-up of face only, cropping at neck level, focusing primarily on facial features and headphones. Slight three-quarter angle view with a subtle head tilt, looking slightly off to the side with a confident and approachable expression. Wearing a cozy white winter sweater with subtle snowflake pattern visible at collar area. Clean anime art style with crisp line art, vivid colors, smooth digital shading, expressive eyes, sharp outline, high contrast. Winter-themed background with soft blue gradient (pale blue to white), subtle snowflake decorations floating around, gentle winter atmosphere. Perfect for logo use with square ratio (1:1). -- Negative: no blurry, no washed-out colors, no sweat, no tears, no water effects, no sketch, no semi-realistic style, no 3D, no extra accessories, no child-like, no chibi, no deformed, no bad anatomy, no direct stare, no stiff pose, no body, no shoulders, no torso, no busy background, no dark colors
```

### Template 6: ğŸ”µ Winter Logo - Monochrome Blue Accent (Artistic)

```
TAPI, an anime girl with long flowing blonde hair, bright blue eyes, large red over-ear headphones. Gentle confident smile with artistic winter feel. Hair has icy blue highlights reflecting winter theme, headphones have subtle frost effect on padding. Wearing elegant white winter turtleneck. Artistic winter color treatment with emphasis on cool blue tones while maintaining warm skin tone contrast. Clean anime art style with crisp line art, strategic color accents (blue and white dominant with red headphones as focal point), smooth digital shading, sharp outline, high contrast. Square ratio (1:1) for artistic logo design. -- Negative: no blurry, no muddy colors, no sweat, no tears, no sketch, no semi-realistic style, no 3D, no excessive accessories, no child-like, no chibi, no deformed, no bad anatomy, no body visible, no shoulders, no torso, no overly complex background, no dark atmosphere
```
